properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 4 at 6:06PM MST until February 8 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Grand Junction CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2
feet possible with localized upwards of 3 feet. Winds could
gust as high as 45 mph.

* WHERE...Elkhead and Park Mountains.

* WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon through late Friday night.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy
blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty
winds could bring down tree branches. The cold wind chills as
low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in
as little as 30 minutes. A detailed map of the snowfall can be
found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
properties.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT
